message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm only offering it to you for $100, a fraction of its true value. It's a one-time deal, so don't miss out!

I'm glad you liked the deal! I've got another one that's just as good. This product is a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. It's a chance to get a unique item at a price that's hard to beat. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but based on my previous experience with a low-quality product, I think I'll pass on this opportunity to avoid disappointment.
